title: Donate To The Maryland Food Bank & WJZ’s Virtual Food Drive
body: The COVID pandemic is stretching the Maryland Food Bank’s safety net more than ever. Food donations are shrinking, while the demand for food assistance continues to grow. WJZ is proud to partner with the Maryland Food Bank to host a Virtual Food Drive to support local communities.Your online donation will help make sure there is enough food for all of our neighbors in need. Please visit  to make a donation.
